experiencia_texto: Over 5 years of experience developing robust and scalable web applications. I specialize in technologies like PHP, JavaScript, Laravel, Yii2, Vue.js and React.js, as well as database management with MySQL, PostgreSQL and implementation of solutions with WordPress and Drupal.
desarrollo_web_desc: I design and develop websites and web applications tailored to your needs.
plataformas_desc: I design, structure and develop custom platforms for your business.
ecommerce_desc: I boost your sales potential through e-Commerce with payment gateway integration.
cms_desc: I develop fast sites with WordPress and Drupal, applying different security techniques.
diseno_web_desc: I create effective web design that makes an impact on your brand.
consultoria_desc: I design and create the interface your company needs, secure and easy to use.
proyectos_texto: website where you'll find more projects I've collaborated on as a web developer.
minestle_desc: Site with articles, recipes, promotions and podcasts filtered by country.
nescafe_desc: Website development for the special edition Nescafé Huehuetenango.
crypto_desc: Landing page with countdown for crypto currency exhibition event in Dubai.
chappsy_desc: Website development with instant e-commerce activation.
viajegt_desc: Directory of associated companies and blog for the Sustainable Tourism Commission of Agexport.
agexport_desc: Multisite development of Exportable Offer for the sectors of Agexport Guatemala.
checklist_desc: Platform to maintain a checklist of toy collections.
acerca_descripcion_1: I am a passionate developer with over 5 years of experience creating robust and scalable web applications. I specialize in technologies like PHP, JavaScript, Laravel, Yii2, Vue.js and React.js, as well as database management with MySQL, PostgreSQL and implementation of solutions with WordPress and Drupal.
acerca_descripcion_2: I enjoy the challenge of exploring and mastering new technologies to constantly expand my skills. I love setting challenging goals to push myself and find creative solutions to obstacles, committing to contribute my best effort in every project.
ia2030_summary: Responsible for creating and maintaining a central administration platform for a systems company in the gaming and lottery sector, ensuring system reliability, security and usability for internal users.
ia2030_resp_1_desc: I designed, implemented and maintained critical features for multiple web projects, ensuring system scalability and stability. This included dynamic configuration of products and draws, and creation of reusable components to optimize workflow.
ia2030_resp_2_desc: I optimized code architecture, reducing complexity and improving maintainability for future developments. This resulted in significant improvement in application performance.
ia2030_resp_3_desc: I led the creation of critical modules for the administration platform, managing the project from initial requirements to production deployment. This included close collaboration with back-end and design teams.
ia2030_resp_4_desc: I provided level 3 production support, responding to incidents and debugging failures in real time to ensure service continuity and customer satisfaction.
ia2030_resp_5_desc: I collaborated on optimizing database queries for editing entities and products, avoiding performance issues and timeouts.
weclick_senior_resp_1: I led the complete development cycle for web applications and digital marketing campaigns for major international clients in Central America and Uruguay.
weclick_senior_resp_2: I collaborated in multidisciplinary teams following agile methodologies to deliver projects within established deadlines.
weclick_senior_resp_3: I implemented technical solutions that processed transactions and managed user data securely and efficiently.

proyecto_borges_desc_2: I implemented administration modules, participant validation and report generation
proyecto_borges_desc_3: I optimized performance to handle traffic peaks during promotional campaigns

proyecto_purina_desc_2: I implemented a matching algorithm that improved user experience

proyecto_minestle_desc_2: I implemented custom modules and optimized site performance

weclick_junior_resp_3: I maintained and optimized existing systems improving their functionality and performance.
